# prefersDarkUserInterfaceStyle

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the system draws the user interface in Dark Mode.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var prefersDarkUserInterfaceStyle: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

To adopt the dark user interface style, set this value to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] before you provide the root template or push any templates. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], which allows templates to change between light and dark styles.

## Configuring the Interface Controller

- **delegate**: An object that serves as the delegate to the interface controller.
- **CPInterfaceControllerDelegate**: The interface that an object implements to serve as a delegate to an interface controller.
- **setRootTemplate(_:animated:completion:)**: Sets the root template of the navigation hierarchy.
